title: The Industrial revolution
creator_credit: W. Hugh Baddeley and Hugh Baddeley Productions
brief_description: The story of the industrial developments that transformed the cottage industries of the eighteenth century into the power-driven factories of the nineteenth century. Describes development of the steam-engine, inventions in the textile industry and developments in communications and transport.
